snippet: After years of overzealous expansion leading up the Beijing Olympic Games, China’s sportswear makers are showing signs of a sustained turnaround.
lead_paragraph: After years of overzealous expansion leading up the Beijing Olympic Games, China’s sportswear makers are showing signs of a sustained turnaround.

headline.main: Chinese Sportswear Makers See Signs of Growth
headline.print_headline: Chinese Sportswear Makers See Signs of Growth
